unnormalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for talent acquisition. We at ABC Corp are keen to visit IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad this year. Our focus is on fresh graduates with strong analytical skills. The deadline for applications is 15th July 2024. Remember the "3 Idiots" message: Chase excellence, success will follow. We offer a starting salary of Rs. 8,00,000 per annum plus benefits. Good luck to all aspirants.
normalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for talent acquisition. We at A B C Corp are keen to visit I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad this year. Our focus is on fresh graduates with strong analytical skills. The deadline for applications is fifteenth July two thousand and twenty four. Remember the "three Idiots" message: Chase excellence, success will follow. We offer a starting salary of rupee eight hundred thousand per annum plus benefits. Good luck to all aspirants.
